message: The booking page is now up and running and and I invite anyone who visits here to test it out by clicking the Book Now buttons and mock select rooms and dates in the calendar, use made up names/emails - no actual email confirmations are sent out yet. This is for testing the logic and functionality on the site.
The Rooms page is now up and running - feel free to poke around and let me know if you find any glitches, G.
Newly renovated gorgeous kitchen includes premium appliances, Brevile automatic coffee maker with a built-in grinder,  expanded cookware to satisfy most budding Chefs.
Both our main bathroom and the powder room feature a smart toilet - the ultimate in personal hygien and comfort.
Working hard (or at least pretending to) on building this website.
New kitchen amenities added including premium coffee maker and expanded cookware.
Winter special: Complimentary firewood and extended checkout time for weekend stays.
Happy New Year! Thank you for making 2023 wonderful. Looking forward to hosting you in 2024!
